website_summaries.verdict: At just $50, the feature-rich Pantech Burst packs in more high-end goodies than you'd expect from a budget LTE phone. However, call quality and battery life aren't its strong suits.
pros: The Pantech Burst is blessed with 4G LTE, a terrific 4-inch Super AMOLED display, a great 5-megapixel camera, a dual-core 1.5GHz processor, interesting design touches, and a sweet $50 price tag
cons: The Burst's call quality and speakerphone are disappointing, battery life is so-so, and you'll need a tool or a set of talons to remove the back cover

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not need a sophisticated I phone. I need texting, gmail, internet and the use of up to ten apps, that's it -- and this little 4G phone delivers. It delivers it all. This is the second Burst I have owned (the first was stolen) and I am so happy to have it back!! The only complaint is that the phone antenna may need to be better. I have heard that I live in an area with fluctuating cell signal, I seldom have 4 - 5 bars -- usually 1 or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Exactly

customer_reviews.title: WORST PHONE EVER, finally beat it to death and it felt good.
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I ever owned. I can't believe how much this phone crashes. I get messages constantly that "phone is not responding" I must have a lemon if it is rated this high. Battery life is awful as well. In fact it lags with every app I use. I can't say anything good about it, it sucks period. UPDATE: today I finally beat the phone to death. I smashed into my steering wheel and it died. Bought a used samsung galaxy and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone Pantech Burst P9070 AT&T GSM Unlocked Cell Phone - Black
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after putting service on the old Pantech that was giving to my daughter, The phone it would not place calls. So since i had order a case for this type of phone and she really like the phone, I Ended up ordering a Pantech Burst P9070 AT&T GSM Unlocked Cell Phone - Black . The phone is as advertised came on time in about 2-3 days I order the phone torse the end of the week i think late Thursday night and got it Tuesday UPS. 5 Stars for item, packaging, and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: MzMeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Great phone , weak battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my wife . So overall the build quality of the phone is good , no plastic squicky sound and so on. Interface is very smooth thanks to a powerfull Qualcomm MSM8660 Snapdragon 1,5 GHZ DualCore processor and Adreno 220 Graphics chip and this is why battery litterally dies in front of one's eyes ! With normal usage of 3-4 hours the battery icon starts blinking red and makes me nervously look for a charger . Other than that the unit is a great smartphone . 4 stars for weak battery
customer_reviews.author: Ramin Geo

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this phone a 5 if not for only one issue; it takes about 18hrs to charge complete every time the battery is dead. If you are thinking about buying this phone, you should consider buying one or two extra batteries pluse a cellphone battery charger so you can avoid beining tied down waiting 18hrs for your phone to finish charge. For those who cannot afford an Iphone 4 or samsung galaxy get a pantach they are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Elie

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smartphone for my son without the high price tag that comes with them. He picked this one out and is very happy with it so far. It worked perfectly with our AT&T account. I was leery of buying an unlocked phone, but I bought this one, a Pantech Crossover and a Sony Experia. All three came from Amazon and the tech at AT&T had no problems putting them on our account. And I saved a lot of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great cell phone.,
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cell phone, as all Pantech products I have bought, The product is 100 % of high quality, strong signal in wifi and coverage. Very fast, lots of useful apps included plus lots of more that can be installed to it, including Word Documents reader and editor, PDF readers, etc. Very useful and handy.
customer_reviews.author: jr2012

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary cheap phone!
customer_reviews.text: Has one of the best speakers I've ever heard, runs fairly smoothly without major problems. Resets itself on occasion and apps and even messenger like to stop responding sometimes more often then others. My Major problem is for whatever reason when I call people nobody can hear me, like I am whispering or far away from the phone, however if I put in my headphones people can hear me fine. Since I use my headphones almost constantly anyways not a huge issue, but a problem nonetheless if i don't have headphones around or they break.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Monsees

customer_reviews.title: Own two Bursts!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a terrific buy! I have owned one for about a year now and I love it. I just replaced my son's damaged Samsung with the Burst! He thinks it is a great phone. You can't beat the price and all the features.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these phones a couple years ago and loved it. Now I found the same phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband had one of these phones a couple years ago and loved it. Now I found the same phone, except for the operating system has been upgraded. What a deal! Works great. Would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good product except for over heating while on LTE if you re using it for a while and bad battery life overall very good product for the prise if your planning on picking one up make sure you get an extra battery

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Deal
customer_reviews.text: superb phone for a low price. 1.5 Ghz processor, 1 GB RAM, ice cream sandwich and for a price of just 155 dollars unlocked. Its a steal. Try getting a phone with such specs anywhere else and you're looking at well over 450 or even beyond 500. Even with 2 year contract you would get it much higher price than this. I spent hours on amazon hunting for a good deal on an android smartphone that's cheap yet powerful too. and this was the only one I ended up with.

customer_reviews.title: Pantech burst
customer_reviews.text: great perfect and it works very smooth powerful but the battery drains quickly the rear camera isn't so good at all the front facing camera is bad after it's a good product i like it very much i recommended to every one it's a beast ! Lol

If you can root it and install CUSTOM jelly bean on it, it gives an even better preformance not that its necessary . it comes already with stock IceCreamSandiwch not gingerbread. 16GB internal memory. 4GLTE, I love it,

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have recently bought this product coming from the LG Optimus Q. The difference is astounding. This is an excellent device running very smoothly. I was skeptical going from a physical keyboard to a full touch but the screen is so responsive that I actually like it more. The phone is fast and has a great sleek design. It's like getting everything you want from the popular big brand phones for less than half the price. Highly recommend this phone.

I bought these for two of my children who are progressing well at school and you should see the smiles on their little bright faces. Thank you AMAZON!

customer_reviews.text: Not a true unlocked phone from the manufacturer, but an unlocked ATT phone. This means that it had all the ATT bloatware installed. Would rather have a phone that comes from the manufacturer, unlocked.

customer_reviews.title: Pantech Burst
customer_reviews.text: You should be aware that the phone requires a *Micro* SIM Card (SKU 72290), so you won't be able to transfer your old standard-sized card from your old phone to this one. The standard SIM card won't fit. Other than that, thanks largely in part to it's faster (duo-core) processor and extra memory, it's definitely an upgrade to my old Pantech Crossover. As for battery life, with normal usage, I've found it necessary to put mine on the charger at least every 24-36 hours. Leaving wi-fi turned on appears to cause the biggest drain.
customer_reviews.author: J. HILL

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Unable to get phone to operate using digital data on a 3g network. Works like a really nice cell phone.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the phone and the overall Amazon experience
customer_reviews.text: This phone provided everything that I personally need at an amazingly low price. It even has expandable memory although, being a light user, I doubt I will ever need it. I took a leap of faith in ordering this phone as I had purchased the same one in May of 2017 which turned out to be defective. The provider was helpful and refunded my money. I am happy with the phone and the overall Amazon experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ganser

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOT UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone after calling the company and they assured me that the phone was unlocked. When I received the phone, it was NOT UNLOCKED. The company also decided to REMOVE the original battery and charger and repackaged it with CHEAP generic replacements. Why sell it as brand new as if everything is original when in reality the customer is being shortchanged! On a positive note, the phone has incredible specs. Dual core 1.5 ghz processor is really fast for web browsing and videos. Great price for the specs. Update: The generic battery proved to be worthless. Stays fully charged for 3 hours. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: PANTECH WENT OUT OF BUSINESS. Has a lot of ...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!

I really have no complaints and everything works good. The display is the real winner, though. Very responsive and a pleasure to use.

customer_reviews.title: not a bad inexpensive phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone pleasantly surprised me. I wasn't expecting much out of and android phone this cheap but I was wrong. This phone is fast and hasn't crashed on me once. Very responsive and has handled very app I have tried on it. I would recommend this phone to anyone looking for a good phone for less that $100

customer_reviews.title: Nice responsive phone

Does work perfectly with any of my bluetooth devices (may take a few tries to initially set up). A very responsive phone. Enough memory for contacts, music, books & games.. if you need more room, sd ecpansion card

customer_reviews.title: Came updated with ics!! Which saved me time and made me happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for the price. I spent ages debating which phone to buy off amazon and i kept coming back to this one. The processor is fast and snappy. Camera is really clear in good lighting, and i love how pantech customized ics. Oh and the screen!! I love it, very sharp and clear. Colors are bright. The battery life isnt the best but with a few tinkering it can be easily boosted. Root wasnt hard at all either, and simce this is a fairly popular phone there are several custom roms put there. Even a cyanogenmod10 port, which runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not the original Pantech Battery
customer_reviews.text: This time the battery inlcuded with the phone is not the original one. It's a generic battery. Previously I bought a Pantech and that one it's okay, came with the priiginal battery. Now they are selling the same phone but the battery included it's not the original. I hope this battery works, but I don't trust on it.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad phone, just can't use as hotspot
customer_reviews.text: This cell phone is unlocked, but you cannot use as a hotspot as is an AT&T model. The seller was willing to exchange for refund, but I kept it anyway. Just can't use as a wifi hotspot. It worked fine in Australia using an Australian simcard.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design

product_meta.title: Pantech Burst P9070 Black Unlocked Cell Phone
product_meta.description:
The Pantech Burst is a lighting-fast Android smartphone offering 4G LTE connectivity with dual-core processors and 16GB of internal storage. It also comes with a 5-megapixel main camera with 720p HD video recording, multi-format music player, Bluetooth functionality, GPS navigation, and WiFi. The Burst is also equipped with quadband GSM and WCDMA modes enabling it for international use. This device also offers access to thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store.

This device may require a data plan for activation. Please contact your cellular provider for details.
feature_bullets: 1650mAh lithium-ion battery delivers up to 450 minutes of usage and 10 days of standby time
4G LTE speeds, brilliant color, ultra-crisp text, and stunning visual imagery rendered by its 4" Super AMOLEDTM touchscreen display
quick file downloads, agile Web browsing, and easy multitasking, with a 1.5 GHz Qualcomm ScorpionTM dual-core processor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars136 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: Primary Camera: 5 MP, 2592 ? 1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash|Secondary Camera: VGA
